programme.desc: A special bulletin covering all the news about the FIFA U-17 World Cup Qatar 2025, which will see the participation of 48 teams, including six Arab teams: Qatar, Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, Morocco, Tunisia and Egypt. programme.title: Al Shamal vs Al Wakrah - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W7
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Match 2 Men - FIP World Cup Pairs Padel - Kuwait 2025
programme.desc: The inaugural FIP World Cup – Pairs in Kuwait (Nov 3-9 2025) crowns the first-ever “FIP World Champion” pair in men’s and women’s categories. Winners receive 2,000 FIP ranking points and a combined prize pool of over €1 million, equally shared between the men’s and women’s draws. Kuwait builds on its success hosting the Premier Padel P1 earlier in the season.

programme.title: Um Salal vs Al Sadd - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W7
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: ONE Fight Night 37 - 2025
programme.desc: Kryklia vs Agdeve hits Bangkok's Lumpinee Stadium, live in U.S. primetime Fri, Nov 7. The towering Ukrainian Roman Kryklia chases a historic third strap as he meets unbeaten 21-year-old KO artist Samet "The King" Agdeve for the inaugural ONE Heavyweight Kickboxing World Title. Also: Nico "King of the North" Carrillo vs Luke "The Chef" Lessei in featherweight Muay Thai, plus Elbek Alyshov, Carlo "The Bull" Bumina-ang, Jacob Smith, Rambolek and Abdulla Dayakaev.

programme.title: مالي ضد النمسا - كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة قطر 2025 - المجموعة L
programme.desc: كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة لكرة القدم 2025 ستقام كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة لكرة القدم 2025 في قطر من 3 حتى 27 نوفمبر. وستكون هذه أول بطولة من خمس بطولات متتالية لكأس العالم تحت 17 سنة تقام في قطر. ستكون هذه النسخة هي الأولى التي يتم لعبها بتنسيق 48 فريقًا بدلاً من البطولات السابقة التي تقام كل عامين والتي تضم 24 فريقًا.

programme.title: Basel vs FCSB - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Europa League is the secondary club football tournament organised by UEFA. This is the second season played under a new format, which replaced the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. Tottenham Hotspur are the reigning champions. The final will be played on 20 May 2026 at Beşiktaş Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.desc: The UEFA Conference League is the third-tier club football tournament organised by UEFA. The new format competition runs for its second season live and exclusive only on beIN. The RB Arena in Leipzig, Germany, is the venue for the Conference League final on 27 May 2026.

programme.title: Toulouse vs Paris - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Match 2 Men - FIP World Cup Pairs Padel - Kuwait 2025
programme.desc: The inaugural FIP World Cup – Pairs in Kuwait (Nov 3-9 2025) crowns the first-ever “FIP World Champion” pair in men’s and women’s categories. Winners receive 2,000 FIP ranking points and a combined prize pool of over €1 million, equally shared between the men’s and women’s draws. Kuwait builds on its success hosting the Premier Padel P1 earlier in the season.

programme.title: Tourcoing vs Toulouse - Marmara Spike ligue Volleyball - 2025
Match 1 Women - FIP World Cup Pairs Padel - Kuwait 2025
programme.desc: The inaugural FIP World Cup – Pairs in Kuwait (Nov 3-9 2025) crowns the first-ever “FIP World Champion” pair in men’s and women’s categories. Winners receive 2,000 FIP ranking points and a combined prize pool of over €1 million, equally shared between the men’s and women’s draws. Kuwait builds on its success hosting the Premier Padel P1 earlier in the season.

programme.title: Felix AUGER-ALIASSIME (CAN) vs Jannik SINNER (ITA) - Final - Rolex Paris Masters - Paris - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Rolex Paris Masters will be held from 27 October to 2 November at the new Paris La Défense Arena. Now in its 54th edition, this ATP Masters 1000 tournament features the world’s top players battling on indoor hard courts in both singles and doubles draws. With total prize money of €6,128,940, the event serves as the final major stop before the ATP Finals, promising a thrilling conclusion to the tennis season.

programme.title: Qarabağ vs Chelsea - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. Paris Saint-Germain are the defending champions. The 2025/26 UEFA Champions League will be the second to be played under the new 36-team league phase. The final will be played on 30 May 2026 at Puskás Aréna in Budapest, Hungary.

programme.title: Dinamo Zagreb vs Celta de Vigo - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Europa League is the secondary club football tournament organised by UEFA. This is the second season played under a new format, which replaced the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. Tottenham Hotspur are the reigning champions. The final will be played on 20 May 2026 at Beşiktaş Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.title: Real Betis vs Olympique Lyonnais - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Europa League is the secondary club football tournament organised by UEFA. This is the second season played under a new format, which replaced the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. Tottenham Hotspur are the reigning champions. The final will be played on 20 May 2026 at Beşiktaş Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.title: Elche vs Real Sociedad - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 12
programme.desc: All matches from the 2025–26 La Liga season are available live and exclusive only on beIN. La Liga, Spain's premier football competition, runs from 15 August 2025 until 24 May 2026. Barcelona are the defending champions, having won their 28th title the previous season.

programme.title: Eastern FC (HKG) vs Ratchaburi FC (THA) - AFC Champions League Two 2025/2026 - East MD4
programme.desc: The AFC Champions League Two is the second-tier competition of Asian club football, ranked below the AFC Champions League Elite. Participation in the competition is open to clubs from the top 12 nations in the East and the West region based on the AFC club competitions ranking. All games are live and exclusive only on beIN.

programme.title: التشيك ضد بوركينا فاسو - كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة قطر 2025 - المجموعة الأولى
programme.desc: كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة لكرة القدم 2025 ستقام كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة لكرة القدم 2025 في قطر من 3 حتى 27 نوفمبر. وستكون هذه أول بطولة من خمس بطولات متتالية لكأس العالم تحت 17 سنة تقام في قطر. ستكون هذه النسخة هي الأولى التي يتم لعبها بتنسيق 48 فريقًا بدلاً من البطولات السابقة التي تقام كل عامين والتي تضم 24 فريقًا.

programme.title: Um Salal vs Al Sadd - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W7
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: EN EPL The Big Interview 2025/26 | E13
programme.desc: Extended sit-downs and more informal 'out and about' interviews with the Premier League's biggest names.

programme.title: EN Carabao Cup Highlights 2025-26 | Round 4
programme.desc: Live and exclusive only on beIN, the English Football League Cup, often referred to as the League Cup and officially known as the Carabao Cup. Current Champions are Newcastle United. The winner of the competition qualifies for the play-off round of the 2026–27 UEFA Conference League.

programme.title: ONE Fight Night 37 - 2025
programme.desc: Kryklia vs Agdeve hits Bangkok's Lumpinee Stadium, live in U.S. primetime Fri, Nov 7. The towering Ukrainian Roman Kryklia chases a historic third strap as he meets unbeaten 21-year-old KO artist Samet "The King" Agdeve for the inaugural ONE Heavyweight Kickboxing World Title. Also: Nico "King of the North" Carrillo vs Luke "The Chef" Lessei in featherweight Muay Thai, plus Elbek Alyshov, Carlo "The Bull" Bumina-ang, Jacob Smith, Rambolek and Abdulla Dayakaev.

programme.title: EN EPL Netbusters 2025/2026 | E10
programme.desc: Highlights of the Premier League Matchweek from an alternative angle. A look back at every goal from every game using the best ISOs and Slow Motion angles.

programme.title: EPL Stories 2025/26 Ep.21 - Sandro Tonali
programme.desc: Showcasing the personalities who have shaped the Premier League era, in each episode we tell their unique story that will be sure to engage and entertain all fans.

programme.desc: A weekly Magazine that provides unique access inside the Paris Saint Germain world.

programme.title: مالي ضد النمسا - كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة قطر 2025 - المجموعة L
programme.desc: كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة لكرة القدم 2025 ستقام كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة لكرة القدم 2025 في قطر من 3 حتى 27 نوفمبر. وستكون هذه أول بطولة من خمس بطولات متتالية لكأس العالم تحت 17 سنة تقام في قطر. ستكون هذه النسخة هي الأولى التي يتم لعبها بتنسيق 48 فريقًا بدلاً من البطولات السابقة التي تقام كل عامين والتي تضم 24 فريقًا.

programme.title: Toulouse vs Paris - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

The final will be played on 20 May 2026 at Beşiktaş Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.
